body_content.explanation: involving or using many different ways to make a product, information, etc. available:
examples: Multichannel retailing refers to companies that sell online, in stores, and through catalogues.
Retailers plan to aggressively pursue multi-channel marketing.

body_content.explanation: involving several different channels that can be used to send out or receive signals:
examples: Security staff use multichannel digital radios that work in tunnels.

body_content.explanation: involving or having many different television stations:
examples: These consumers are more likely to have multichannel television not because they watch more television, but because they want more choice.
